Text: HOW DO YOU GET THIS TO PLAY IN FULLSCREEN ON A 42 INCH PLASMA TV,AFTER I BURN IT TO DVD ,AND I PLAY IT IN MY DVD PLAYER IT DOES NOT FIT THE ENTIRE SCREEN,NO MATTER WHAT I DO WITH THE TV SETTINGS,ANYONE KNOW WHAT IS WRONG.
if you have dvi on your pc and hdmi on your hdtv just get a dvi-hdmi cable from monoprice.com and it should work great. no need to bother with burning shit.
